thread.section_title: Zoho Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zoho | www.zoho.com
thread.title: Aditya Narayan Singh
thread.title_full: Zoho reviewed by Aditya Narayan Singh

author: Aditya Narayan Singh
title: Aditya Narayan Singh
text: I just had a free account with Zoho and I realise how good the service is... the email frontend is very beautiful and clear ..there is not even once that they would try to force cell some of their services... so much for free is almost impossible anywhere else... thanks a lot
